children.name: Amaron
children.sourceText: And now I, Amaron, write the things whatsoever I write, which are few, in the book of my father.

children.name: brother
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that I did deliver the plates unto my brother Chemish.

children.name: Chemish
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that I did deliver the plates unto my brother Chemish.

children.name: deliver
children.sourceText: Wherefore, the Lord did visit them in great judgment; nevertheless, he did spare the righteous that they should not perish, but did deliver them out of the hands of their enemies.

children.name: destroyed
children.sourceText: Behold, it came to pass that three hundred and twenty years had passed away, and the more wicked part of the Nephites were destroyed.
